@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Curve.documentation: Represents a 3D vector curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve children instances.

@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Curve.GetValue.documentation: Represents a 3D vector curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve children instances.

Samples the 3 FloatCurves (X, Y, Z) at the time passed as argument. Returns the 3 samples as a tuple of 3 numbers. If a channel curve is missing or no key is found in the curve the channel is evaluated as nil.

@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Curve.X/param/.documentation: Represents a 3D vector curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve children instances.

@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Curve.X.documentation: Returns the FloatCurve controlling the X channel. It is the first child instance of type FloatCurve named X. If none is found an empty FloatCurve is created.

@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Curve.Y/param/.documentation: Represents a 3D vector curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve children instances.

@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Curve.Y.documentation: Returns the FloatCurve controlling the Y channel. It is the first child instance of type FloatCurve named Y. If none is found an empty FloatCurve is created.

@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Curve.Z/param/.documentation: Represents a 3D vector curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve children instances.

@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Curve.Z.documentation: Returns the FloatCurve controlling the Z channel. It is the first child instance of type FloatCurve named Z. If none is found an empty FloatCurve is created.

@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Value.documentation: 単一の Vector3 のコンテナオブジェクトvalue。
@roblox/globaltype/Vector3Value.code_sample:
-- Paste me in a Script inside a Part
local part = script.Parent
-- A Vector3Value to hold the Teleport target position
-- Tip: Prefix variables of "Value-" objects with "v"
local vTeleportPosition = part.TeleportPosition 

local function onTouch(otherPart)
	-- First, find the HumanoidRootPart. If we can't find it, exit.
	local hrp = otherPart.Parent:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")
	if not hrp then return end
	
	-- Now teleport by setting the CFrame to one created from
	-- the stored in TeleportPosition
	hrp.CFrame = CFrame.new(vTeleportPosition.Value)
end

part.Touched:Connect(onTouch)

@roblox/globaltype/VRService.documentation: The VRService is a service that is responsible for handling interactions between Roblox and Virtual Reality.
@roblox/globaltype/VRService.code_sample:
-- We must get the VRService before we can use it
local VRService = game:GetService("VRService")

-- A sample function providing one usage of UserCFrameChanged
local function userCFrameChanged(typ, value)
	print(typ.Name + " changed. Updated Frame: " + value)
end

VRService.UserCFrameChanged:Connect(userCFrameChanged)

@roblox/globaltype/VRService.GuiInputUse.documentation: Describes what UserCFrame is responsible for input in VR.
@roblox/globaltype/VRService.GuiInputUse.code_sample:
local VRService = game:GetService("VRService")

if (VRService.VREnabled) then
	print(VRService.GuiInputUserCFrame.Name)
else
	print("No VR device detected!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/VRService.VREnabled.documentation: Describes whether the user is using a virtual reality device
@roblox/globaltype/VRService.VREnabled.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local head = character:WaitForChild("Head")

local function TrackHead(inputType, value)
	if inputType == Enum.UserCFrame.Head then
		head.CFrame = value
	end
end

if UserInputService.VREnabled then
	-- Set the inital CFrame
	head.CFrame = UserInputService:GetUserCFrame(Enum.UserCFrame.Head)
	
	-- Track VR headset movement and mirror for character's head
	UserInputService.UserCFrameChanged:Connect(TrackHead)
end

The mode of the specified VRTouchpad.
Returns the VRTouchpadMode indicating the mode of a specified VRTouchpad.

@roblox/globaltype/VRService.GetUserCFra.documentation: The VRService is a service that is responsible for handling interactions between Roblox and Virtual Reality.
Returns a CFrame describing the position & orientation of a specified virtual reality device.
@roblox/globaltype/VRService.GetUserCFra.code_sample:
local VRService = game:GetService("VRService")

local cf = VR:GetUserCFrame(Enum.UserCFrame.Head)
print("Enum.UserCFrame.Head:\t", cf)

@roblox/globaltype/VRService.GetUserCFra.documentation: The VRService is a service that is responsible for handling interactions between Roblox and Virtual Reality.
The specified type of VR device.
A boolean indicating whether the specified VR device is enabled (true) or disabled (false).
Returns true if the specified UserCFrame is available to be listened to.
@roblox/globaltype/VRService.GetUserCFra.code_sample:
local VRService = game:GetService("VRService")

local isEnabled = VRService:GetUserCFrameEnabled(UserCFrame.Head)
if (isEnabled) then
	print("VR device is enabled!")
else
	print("VR device is disabled!")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/VRService.RecenterUse.documentation: The VRService is a service that is responsible for handling interactions between Roblox and Virtual Reality.
Recenters the CFrame to the current location of the VR headset being worn by the user.

@roblox/globaltype/VRService.RequestNavi.documentation: The VRService is a service that is responsible for handling interactions between Roblox and Virtual Reality.
The VR device for which the navigation is requested.
Requests navigation to the specified DataType.CFrame, using the specified Enum.UserCFrame as the origin for the visualizer parabola.

@roblox/globaltype/WorldRoot.ArePartsTou.documentation:
部品のリストでは、リスト内の部品が接触していないかチェックされます。
リストにない部品。

スタッドのパーツオーバーラップしきい値は、パーツがオーバーラップする前に無視されます
触っていると考えられる。
True iff any of the Part in partList are touching any other parts (parts not in the partList). False if no parts are passed.
与えられた BasePart のどれかが他のパーツと接触している場合に true を返します。
@roblox/globaltype/WorldRoot.ArePartsTou.code_sample:
-- Create 2 parts that overlap 1 stud
local part1 = Instance.new("Part")
part1.Name = "Part1"
part1.Anchored = true
part1.Parent = workspace
part1.Transparency = 0.5
part1.Color = Color3.new(385, 100, 38)
part1.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
part1.Position = Vector3.new(0, 4, 0)

local part2 = Instance.new("Part")
part2.Name = "Part2"
part2.Anchored = true
part2.Parent = workspace
part2.Transparency = 0.5
part2.Color = Color3.new(200, 10, 0)
part2.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
part2.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

local partList = { part1 }

print(workspace:ArePartsTouchingOthers(partList, 0)) -- True
print(workspace:ArePartsTouchingOthers(partList, 0.999)) -- True
print(workspace:ArePartsTouchingOthers(partList, 1)) -- False

@roblox/enum/UserInputState.End.documentation: InputObject がゲームとのやりとりを終えたとき。たとえば、 マウスボタンを上げる、キーを上げる、またはタッチが画面に触れなくなったとき。

@roblox/enum/VelocityConstraintMode.Line.documentation:
ラインの方向の速度成分は、指定した値に制限されます。線の方向は、relativeTo プロパティに基づきます。
-relativeTo_Attachment0: ラインの方向は、アタッチメント0の主軸です。
-relativeTo_Attachment1: ラインの方向は、アタッチメント1の主軸です。
-relativeTo_World: 線の方向を指定する必要があります。

@roblox/enum/VelocityConstraintMode.Plan.documentation:
平面内の速度成分は、指定した値に制限されます。プレーンの接線は、relativeTo プロパティに基づきます。
-relativeTo_Attachment0: プレーンの接線は、アタッチメント0の2つの軸です。
-relativeTo_Attachment1: プレーンの接線は、アタッチメント1の2つの軸です。
-relativeTo_World: 2 つの平面接線を指定する必要があります

@roblox/enum/VelocityConstraintMode.Vect.documentation:
速度成分は、指定したベクトル成分と等しくなければなりません。ベクトルの座標系は、relativeTo プロパティに基づいています。
-relativeTo_Attachment0: ベクトルコンポーネントは、attachment0 の軸によって定義される座標系内にあります。
-relativeTo_Attachment1: ベクトルコンポーネントは、attachment1 の軸によって定義される座標系内にあります。
-relativeTo_World: 座標系はワールドにあり、ベクトルコンポーネントを指定する必要があります。

@roblox/enum/VelocityConstraintMode.documentation: Velocity Constraint mode プロパティは、アタッチメントの線形速度がどのように拘束されるかを制御します。
